alert.note: Alert for Middle Yukon Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 28 at 1:59PM AKST until November 29 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations 2 to 4 inches, with up to 7 inches along the Nulato Hills and near Kaltag. Winds gusting to 30 mph with blowing snow and visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Middle Yukon Valley. * WHEN...Until 3 AM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy snow will develop this afternoon and continue into tonight. The heaviest snow will be long the Nulato Hills and near Kaltag where 6 to 7 inches of snow is possible. From Galena east snow amounts will be less with 2 to 4 inches expected. Winds increasing this evening will cause blowing snow in reduced visibility in most areas.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
